EdgeCaseAnnotations: Zero value deposits in Put are allowed but set unlockTime.
Insufficient balance withdrawals in Collect are checked against MinSum and _am parameters.
Unlock time requirement for withdrawals is ensured with now > acc.unlockTime.
CommonAttackPatterns: Reentrancy vulnerability in Collect function as it lacks reentrancy protection.
RecoveryMechanisms: No emergency stop or recovery mechanism is present in the contract.
